name: TRANSPLANT_COOR_HX
description: This table contains a list of all coordinator(s) who have been or are listed as the transplant episode coordinators. This table also contains all organ classes that have been added or removed from the episode.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_COORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider listed as a coordinator for the transplant.

columns.name: TX_COORD_UPD_USR_ID
columns.description: The user who updated transplant coordinator field.

columns.name: TX_COORD_UPD_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: TX_COORD_UPD_INST
columns.description: The instant when transplant coordinator was updated

columns.name: TX_COORD_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the coordinator is active or inactive

columns.name: TX_CLASS_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores organ classifications that have been added or deleted from the episode.
